attributes.action: Halt the proposed Analog Radio Switch-Off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed analog radio switch off disadvantages everyone. It forces you  to scrap all your existing radios - and buy DAB sets instead. 
Car radios, kitchen radios, bedside radios, stereo tuners, all become scrap. And the liberated bandwidth is used for extra services no-one wants - witness the DAB station failures - polluted with advertising, and never again the chance to hear a foreign station by accident.
This is not a future I want.

government_responses.details:
